title: Conduct Keyword Research for a Blog Post
description: A content strategist needs to find relevant keywords to target for a new blog post about 'home office setup'.

tasks.description: Enter the seed keyword 'home office setup' into a keyword research tool.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent uses the tool to start the research process.

tasks.description: Analyze the results to find related keywords with high search volume and low-to-medium difficulty.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies a list of potential target keywords.

tasks.description: Select a primary keyword (e.g., 'best home office setup') and several secondary keywords (e.g., 'small home office ideas', 'ergonomic office chair') to include in the article.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a final, prioritized list of keywords for the writer.
